anime.description: * Based on a sci-fi seinen manga series written by http://anidb.net/cr51639 [Miyagawa Satoshi] and illustrated by http://anidb.net/cr51638 [Itou Kei]. In his time assigned to the space battleship Tiramisu, http://anidb.net/ch93941 [Subaru Ichinose] and his trusty http://anidb.net/ch94402 [Durandal] fought many battles together. He was reunited with his long-lost http://anidb.net/ch93939 [brother], but they became adversaries, crossing swords over and over. Then, destiny took the form of gravity and led these two brothers to alight on Earth! Source: crunchyroll

tag.name: short episodes
tag.description: Short episodes are regular episodes that are much shorter than the standard length. This means up to and including 10 minutes; shows with episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length are http://anidb.net/t6494 [half-length episodes] instead. Not to be confused with http://anidb.net/t6349 [multi-segment episodes], which are regular episodes that are split into several short segments (parts), usually with separate titles and independent storylines.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

episode.title: COCKPIT ADDICTION / IT FALLS INTO THE CHRYSLER
Cockpit Addiction / It Falls into the Chrysler
Cockpit Addiction / It Falls into the Chrysler
episode.summary: Subaru goes into withdrawal after losing his beloved Durandal. Shaking, he instinctively seeks out certain places to cope with the effects of his serious cockpit addiction. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: REUNION / NEO UNIVERSE...
Reunion / Neo Universe...
Reunion / Neo Universe...
episode.summary: Dr. Soichiro Ichinose--first-rate robotics engineer, creator of the Durandal, and father of Subaru and Isuzu--arranges a reunion with his sons on Earth. And while you may have thought the Ichinose brothers were a bit odd, their father is even odder... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: FREEZE! / EYES OF THE HERO
Freeze! / Eyes of the Hero
Freeze! / Eyes of the Hero
episode.summary: Isuzu attempts to steal the Neo Durandal at gunpoint. But when he`s confronted with the painful truth that he`s the only one not "Universing" (=awakening to the Universe Sense), he leaves his family behind. And thus, Subaru and Isuzu part ways once more. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: BUT THERE THERE WAS A GIMLET / AI
But There There Was a Gimlet / AI
But There There Was a Gimlet / AI
episode.summary: The appearance of a new unit piloted by Isuzu`s subordinate Callaway puts the Union fleet in desperate straits. Callaway visits Isuzu to report her success in battle, but certain actions by the man she esteems so highly trigger mental instability. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: GRIM REAPER DANCING / BROTHERS
Grim Reaper Dancing / Brothers
Grim Reaper Dancing / Brothers
episode.summary: The People of Metus break through the Union Fleet`s defensive lines one after another. The Tiramisu receives an SOS from a civilian transport and agrees to temporarily accommodate its passengers. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: IN NO WAY / BEYOND THE ORIGIN
In No Way / Beyond the Origin
In No Way / Beyond the Origin
episode.summary: Subaru is unconscious in the hospital after his gunshot wound, and Isuzu sits by his bedside. As Isuzu begins to speak to his younger brother, a loud and cheery visitor arrives, almost as if to deliberately interrupt him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: URBAN WARFARE / GOD SAID
Urban Warfare / God Said
Urban Warfare / God Said
episode.summary: As Subaru recovers in his hospital room, the voice of his copy, Beyond, echoes inside his head. An epic battle between two Neo Universe Sense users is about to begin! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: DIFFERENT FUTURE / JIKAN YO TOMARE
Different Future / Jikan Yo Tomare
Different Future / Jikan Yo Tomare
episode.summary: Despite a promotion to Lieutenant Junior Grade, Subaru`s battle with Beyond has him questioning whether he should continue as a pilot. Then, he realizes he has an unexpected talent. He senses a new possible future opening up for him... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: THE NEW RECORD(S) / GHOST IN THE COCKPIT
The New Record(s) / Ghost in the Cockpit
The New Record(s) / Ghost in the Cockpit
episode.summary: They say that the space-time distortions in a warp zone can cause those with particularly keen senses to see visions. What hallucinations will Subaru experience during his first warp with Romeo, the ship`s newest pilot? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ON THE OTHER SIDE OF THE STONE MONUMENT / DICTATOR CADILLAC
On the Other Side of the Stone Monument / Dictator Cadillac
On the Other Side of the Stone Monument / Dictator Cadillac
episode.summary: Isuzu, who is plotting to completely revolutionize the Metus, takes his men out for a team-building lunch. Even Beyond participates, and although he is extremely suspicious at first, he finds himself thrilled at the restaurant. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: DURANDAL RISER / PLUG-IN KERUKEION II
Durandal Riser / Plug-in Kerukeion II
Durandal Riser / Plug-in Kerukeion II
episode.summary: The war between the Earth Union and the People of Metus escalates in the wake of Cadillac’s public address. The Earth Union decides to enhance the Neo Durandal by using Romeo`s D Riser as a support mecha. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: BATTLE OF THE HEKATONKHEIRES PART I
Battle of the Hekatonkheires Part I
Battle of the Hekatonkheires Part I
episode.summary: Cadillac attacks Earth with his ultimate weapon, the Hekatonkheires, equipped with the top-secret new Lambda β cockpit. The Earth Union is helpless in the face of its overwhelming power until enemy officer Isuzu makes a certain suggestion... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: BATTLE OF THE HEKATONKHEIRES PART II
Battle of the Hekatonkheires Part II
Battle of the Hekatonkheires Part II
episode.summary: With the fate of Earth hanging in the balance, Subaru and the others continue their desperate battle against the fearsome Hekatonkheires. In the midst of the fighting, Subaru finds something that really shouldn`t be there... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: BIRTHDAY
Birthday
Birthday
episode.summary: September 2nd is Subaru Ichinose`s birthday. The birthday song resounds through space; the applause goes on and on. But before the day is out, Subaru learns the bleakness of adulthood. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: MESSAGE
Message
Message
episode.summary: We live in a convenient age. Words and photos can be sent between phones in real time. Sometimes we even have a lively conversation with family. Caution: Always check your messages before sending. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: MASHI MASHI
Mashi Mashi
Mashi Mashi
episode.summary: There is a magical incantation in that restaurant that everyone wants a chance to chant. The god Beyond proves as unable to resist this temptation as any mortal. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: NETWORK FRIENDS
Network Friends
Network Friends
episode.summary: Koenig, who is currently winning at life, introduces Subaru to various magnificent products. Subaru is eager to tell everyone else about their magnificence, but he is missing an important part of the NETWORK FRIENDS system. Source: crunchyroll
